Concierge Coffee, Arts District LA🕊️Berlin-inspired shop styled in minimal aesthetics🤍

📢 I especially loved the european-style courtyard in the back painted in white and green and surrounded by beautiful arches. 

☕️ featured coffee 
▪️hojicha latte
▪️matcha latte
📝 coffee was average. would like to try a regular latte (barista’s rec) or their signature concierge cream next time instead. 

☑️ recommendation level: 4 out of 5
🚗 street parking
🛋️ seatings inside | courtyard 
🔮 industrial, minimal, elegant ambience 
🙂 average customer service
🦮 dogs allowed 

📍821 Traction Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90013

Loop Espresso Club, Eagle Rock🎶 people-friendly, vibrant espresso bar is finally here in LA!💫

📝 I fell in love in a second when I stepped into the shop and saw a muted Japanese show and music playing in the background at the wooden bar. The coffee tastes authentic and balanced. I recommend sitting at the bar for the full experience.

☕️ featured coffee (* = recommend)
▪️espresso loop* 
- espresso, tsokolate, orange, cream
- cold cream on top, hot espresso at the bottom
▪️espresso canela 
- espresso, cinnamon, cream

☑️ recommendation level: 4.5 out of 5
🚗 street parking
🛋️ table seatings inside, bar seating
🛜 wifi available
🔮 lively, social salon-type of vibes 
😁 great customer service
🦮 dogs allowed
📢 it was packed at 1pm on saturday

📍1954 Colorado Blvd Los Angeles, CA 90041

Suá, Larchmont Village🌿 asian-inspired, beautiful coffee stop🫰🏻

📝 Suá was featured as one of the most innovative restaurant trends of 2023. I loved how all their food, drinks, and even pastries are curated in a unique, asian style.

📢 the shop is founded by @stephhjelmeseth and @jingtheory 

☕️ featured coffee (* = recommend)
-hojicha latte*
-matcha strawberry 

🥐 featured pastry (* = recommend)
-kimchi musubi croissant*
-pear tart

☑️ recommendation level: 4 out of 5

🛋️ seatings inside, outdoor patio
🛜 wifi not available
🔮 calming, airy ambience
🛒 lots of asian goods to explore
😁 great customer service
🦮 dogs allowed
